items.sentence: Tom wanted me to tell you that he was going to be away from the office for a few days.
He turned the bottle upside down and shook it, but still the honey wouldn\'t come out.
I think the reason Tom is so good at French is that he watches a lot of French movies.
Tom still lives in the same house that his parents bought when he was three years old.
Tom doesn\'t have many clothes. That\'s why you always see him wearing the same thing.
